item.description:
This meetup starts Friday January 2nd and ends Sunday January 4th. During the winter EICSL runs a recreational race league in the Mount Washington Valley and this is the first race of the season at Wildcat. As part of the race weekend, there will be $39 lift tickets to Wildcat for members and guests of the club whether racing or not.

The Brettl-Hupfers will be up at our lodge in Bartlett, NH this weekend and guests are welcome for $20 per night guest fees. Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow.

Members and guests must be 21+
item.how_to_find_us: Come on in and say hello
item.name: Brettl-Hupfers Ski & Sports Club Guest Race Weekend (Jan 2-4)
